problem.p: For an angle smaller than the one calculated in part c), a steeper slope, the block will slide down. What is the block's acceleration? Express your answer in some or all of the variables m, g, \(\mu\)s, \(\mu\)k, and \(\alpha\). To write \(\mu\)s, \(\mu\)k, or \(\alpha\), use mus, muk, or alpha.
